text:
Thanks for reading!

8 is just saying I don't design for the code to be behind a pane of glass that others won't modify. That's it.

The reorganizations were point 5, and they're definitely C-focused. Auto-generating headers is a level of spoonfeeding that no other language needs.

6 is for trying to help others grok my codebases. Giving them some way to stage their learning rather than throwing them into the maximum-complexity state right from the start.
